Verses: 1 karththar Sonnadhu: Nee Poik Kuyavan Velaiyaana Oru Kalasaththaikkondu, Janaththin Moopparilum Aasaariyargalin Moopparilum Silaraik Koottikkondu,
2 kizhakku Vaasalukku Edhiraana Innomudaiya Kumaaranin Pallaththaakkile Purappattuppoi, Naan Unnode Sollum Vaarththaigalai Ange Prasiththappaduththu.

3 nee Avargalai Nokki: Yoodhaavin Raajaakkale, Erusalemin Kudigale, Karththarudaiya Vaarththaigalaik Kelungal; Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalinkarththar Sollugiraar: Idho, Naan Indha Sthalaththinmel Oru Pollaappai Varappannuven; Adhaik Ketkira Yaavarudaiya Kaadhugalilum Adhu Thoniththukkondirukkum.

4 avargal Ennai Vittuvittu, Indha Sthalaththai Anniya Sthalamaakki, Thaangalum, Thangal Pidhaakkalum, Yoodhaavin Raajaakkalum, Ariyaadhirundha Anniya Dhevargalukku Adhile Thoobankaatti, Indha Sthalaththaik Kutramillaadhavargalin Raththaththinaale Nirappinapadiyinaalum,

5 thangal Pillaigalaip Paagaalukkuth Thaganapaligalaagath Thaganikkumpadi Paagaalin Medaigalaik Kattinapadiyinaalum Ippadivarappannuven; Ivaigalai Naan Karpiththadhumillai, Sonnadhumillai, Ivaigal En Irudhayaththil Thondrinadhumillai.
6 aagaiyaal, Idho, Naatkalvarum, Appozhudhu Indha Sthalam Thoppeththendrum, Innomudaiya Kumaaranin Pallaththaakkendrum Ini Sollappadaamal, Sangaarappallaththaakkendru Sollappadum.

7 appozhudhu Naan Yoodhaavukkum Erusalemukkum Kondirundha Aalosanaiyai Indha Sthalaththile Verumaiyaakki, Avargal Saththurukkalukku Munbaaga Avargalaip Pattayaththinaalum, Avargal Praananai Vaangaththedugiravargalin Kaiyinaalum Vizhappanni, Avargal Predhangalai Aagaayaththup Paravaigalukkum, Boomiyin Mirugangalukkum Iraiyaagakkoduththu,
8 indha Nagaraththaip Paazhaakkavum, Koochchalittu Nindhikkira Nindhaiyaagavum Vaippen; Adhaik Kadandhupogiravan Evanum Bramiththu, Adhin Ellaa Vaadhaigalinimiththamum Eesaliduvaan.

9 avargaludaiya Saththurukkalum Avargal Praananai Vaangath Thedugiravargalum, Avargalai Irugappidikkappogira Mutrikkaiyilum Idukkaththilum, Naan Avargalaith Thangal Kumaararin Maamsaththaiyum Thangal Kumaaraththigalin Maamsaththaiyum Thinnappannuven; Avanavan Thanakku Aduththavanudaiya Maamsaththaith Thinbaan Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endru Nee Solli,
10 unnodekooda Vandha Manusharudaiya Kangalukku Munbaaga Andhak Kalasaththai Udaiththuppottu,

11 avargalai Nokki: Thirumba Seppanidappadak Koodaadha Kuyavanudaiya Manpaandaththai Udaiththuppottavannamaaga Naan Indha Janaththaiyum Indha Nagaraththaiyum Udaiththuppoduven; Pudhaikkiradharku Idamillaadhadhinaal Thoppeththile Savangalaip Pudhaippaargalendru Senaigalin Karththarsollugiraar.
12 ivvidhamaaga Naan Indha Sthalaththukkum Idhin Kudigalukkum Seydhu, Indha Nagaraththaith Thoppeththukku Sariyaakkuven.

13 endha Veedugalinmel Vaanaththin Sagala Senaikkum Thoobankaatti Anniyadhevargalukkup Paanapaligalai Vaarththaargalo, Andha Veedugalaagiya Erusalemin Veedugalum Yoodhaavudaiya Raajaavin Veedugalum Thoppedh Engira Sthalaththaippol Theettuppattavaigalaai Irukkumendru Karththar Sollugiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
14 pinbu Eremiyaa, Karththar Thannaith Theerkkadharisanancholla Anuppina Thoppeththiliruththu Vandhu, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Praagaaraththile Nindrukondu, Ellaa Janangalaiyum Paarththu:

15 idho, Neengal En Vaarththaigalaik Kelaadhapadikku Ungal Kazhuththaik Kadinappaduththinapadiyinaal Naan Indha Nagaraththukku Virodhamaai Sonna Ellaath Theengaiyum Idhinmelum Idharkaduththa Pattanangalinmelum Varappannuven Endru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar Endraan.
